title: Script / Serif / Ligature
content:
Hi guys, any chance of identifying this gorgeous looking font? Thanks!

Font: 

 Custom Lettering 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051823/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: paul_w

comments.content:
[Custom lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051823/http:/dribbble.com/shots/284136-Dashing-Dish-Round-2) by [Drew Melton](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051823/http:/yourjustlucky.com/)  
Ready-to-go alternatives but far from being even loosely similar: [Breathe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051823/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/argentina-lian-types/breathe), [Aire](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051823/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/argentina-lian-types/aire), [Pitu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051823/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/pitu), [Regal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051823/http:/www.parachute.gr/typefaces)
Thank you so much Ryuk…his work is fantastic!
